oshiSkill.name: ぎゅっきゅっ

spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] During this turn, 1 of your holomem gets Arts+50. Then, if that holomem's color is white, it gets Arts+50.

oshiSkill.name: 文明の守護者
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn]Usable if your holomem with #Promise would take Damage from the opponent during the opponent's turn:1 of those holomem takes -50 Damage.

spOshiSkill.name: アメイジング・ドローイング
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Reveal 1 event from your deck, and add it to hand. Then, shuffle the deck.

oshiSkill.name: サバイバルパワ-~
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Reveal 1 〈Stone Axe〉 from your deck, and attach it to your green holomem. Then, shuffle the deck.

spOshiSkill.name: 大地の唄
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Restore all HP of your green center holomem.

oshiSkill.name: 野兎たち~
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Usable if your holomem is downed during the opponent's turn:Reattach all green cheers from 1 of your downed holomem divided as you choose to your other holomems.

spOshiSkill.name: 幸運兎
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] During this turn, regard all numbers on the faces of your dice as 6.

oshiSkill.name: 女幹部の采配
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Usable if you would archive cards from hand by your red holomem's ability:You may archive 1 of your holo Power instead for each hand card to be archived..

spOshiSkill.name: ホークアイ
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] During your opponent's next turn, your opponent's center holomem and collab holomem cannot Baton Pass, move, or swap..

oshiSkill.name: フェニックステール
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Return 1 holomem from your archive to hand.

spOshiSkill.name: Rise from the ashes
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Usable if your red holomem is downed during your opponent's turn:You take -1 Life Damage. Then, choose 1 downed card, and return all of the stacked holomem including that holomem to hand.

oshiSkill.name: ほうき星
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Usable when this Oshi holomem or your blue holomem deals Damage to your opponent's back holomem:Deal 50 Special Damage to that back holomem.

spOshiSkill.name: シューティングスター
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game]Usable when your blue holomem deals Damage to your opponent's center holomem or collab holomem:Deal the same amount of Special Damage to 1 of your opponent's back holomem..

oshiSkill.name: レイン・シャーマニズム

ability: During your opponent's turn, if the holomem this fan is attached to is downed, send the top card of your cheer deck to your 〈Aki Rosenthal〉.You may only attach this fan to your 〈Aki Rosenthal〉, and you may attach any number of this fan per holomem.

name: Wild Rabbit Alliance
ability: If the holomem this fan is attached to rolled a die by an ability, you may archive this fan:Ignore the previous results, and reroll the die.You may only attach this fan to your 〈Usada Pekora〉, and you may attach any number of this fan per holomem.

name: Pioneers
ability: During your opponent's turn, if the holomem this fan is attached to is downed, reattach 1 cheer from the holomem this fan is attached to to your other holomem.You may only attach this fan to your 〈AZKi〉, and you may attach any number of this fan per holomem.

name: KFP
ability: When this fan is attached from hand to a holomem, you may archive 1 card from your hand:Draw 1 card from your deck.You may only attach this fan to your 〈Takanashi Kiara〉, and you may attach any number of this fan per holomem.

name: 座員 (Zain)
ability: ■If the holomem this fan is attached to would use Arts, this fan is also regarded as a red cheer.■The holomem this fan is attached to takes +10 Damage.You may only attach this fan to your 〈Omaru Polka〉, and you may attach any number of this fan per holomem.
